title: Engulf (mutation)
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1" |- style="font-style:italic;" |Rank||Effect||Flavor |- |1||50% chance of [[engulf]]ing monsters on melee attacks.||Your melee attacks may engulf your foes in ooze. |- | colspan="3" | Only monsters of the same [[size]] or smaller can be engulfed, and constriction immune monsters are immune.
Engulfed monsters are [[silence]]d and take asphyxiation damage (if vulnerable).
Also extinguishes [[sticky flame]]. |- style="font-style:italic;" | colspan="3" | [[Jiyva mutation]] |} [[Category:Mutations]] [[Category:Jiyva Mutations]] [[Category:Engulf flavour]]
